title.narrative: Agricultural Development: Support to Agricultural Development and Rural Entrepreneurship Programme

description.narrative: The programme's overall development goal is to contribute to rural poverty reduction and stimulate economic growth in the programme area. The specific objective is to improve the food security situation and incomes of small scale producers, as well as to create sustainable rural employment opportunities particularly for women and young people. The programme will strengthen the voice of small-scale producers and their organizations and augment their capacity to participate actively in developing value chains under a market-oriented approach to agriculture. Major emphasis will be given to strengthening the capabilities of producer organizations to increase their influence on development processes and progressively widen the range of services they can provide to their members through new and effective forms of partnerships. In addition, the programme will contribute to efforts in building public capacity through institutional support to: (i) the Ministry of Agriculture (Directorate of Analysis, Forecasting and Statistics) in planning and operationalizing a monitoring and evaluation system for the sector; and (ii) the Ministry of Livestock in developing the pastoral code.

name.narrative: Agricultural Development: Support to Agricultural Development and Rural Entrepreneurship Programme

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
